other_title: Jewelpet Le Film: La Princesse du Royaume des Douceurs (French)
Jewelpet the Movie: Sweets Dance Princess
映画ジュエルペット スウィーツダンスプリンセス (Japanese)
plot: Ruby and friends visit Jewel Land's neighboring Kingdom Sweets Land, to celebrate Princess Mana's birthday with a festival. While the party preparation continues a mysterious gummy falls from the Sky. What appears will have them save their world, and eat all the sweets in the land to help save it.
opening_theme: "Magic of Dreams" (夢の魔法; Yume no mahō) by Mana Ashida
ending_theme: "Friends Forever and Ever" (ずっとずっとトモダチ; Zutto Zutto Tomodachi) by Mana Ashida
